text: Dr. Uriel S. Wright Office is a historic doctor's office located at Fayette, Howard County, Missouri. It was built between 1828 and 1832, and is a small two-story, Federal style brick building. The building measures 19 feet square and features decorative window surrounds. (includes 7 photographs from 1986) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1987. It is located in the Fayette Courthouse Square Historic District. ==References== Category:Individually listed contributing properties to historic districts on the National Register in Missouri Category:Office buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Federal architecture in Missouri Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1832 Category:Buildings and structures in Howard County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Howard County, Missouri
title: Dr. Uriel S. Wright Office
